definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The tanks have to be refilled using special equipment.
sentences.chinese: 氣瓶必須用專用設備再次充氣。

sentences.english: The mandril connecting structure is arranged on the jetting joint of the air bottle nozzle.
sentences.chinese: 所述氣瓶嘴的噴射接口上設置有頂杆連接結構。

sentences.english: Regulations, of the periodic vehicle inspection system with cylindersDegrees.
sentences.chinese: 辦法規定，車用氣瓶實行定期檢驗制度。

sentences.english: It even has an onboard oxygen canister.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至還隨身攜帶氧氣瓶。

sentences.english: Service conditions of natural gas composite cylinders for automobiles are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了汽車用複合材料天然氣氣瓶的使用條件。

sentences.english: It connects to pressure-operated servo systems and single-acting power cylinders.
sentences.chinese: 它連接到的壓力，經營的伺服系統和單代理權氣瓶。

sentences.english: The tank provides constant positive pressure to the face mask. An SCBA provides the best protection, but has the following problems
PSCO: Do all the cylinders protect the engine room and cargo holds?
sentences.chinese: 所有氣瓶是保護機艙和貨艙的嗎？

sentences.english: If there is special gas cylinder room, explosion-proof electrical device should be provided in this room.
sentences.chinese: 如有集中的氣瓶間，則該房間的電具要求採用防爆型。

sentences.english: Gas cabinet is an important unit used to handle special gases for semiconductor pro- cess.
sentences.chinese: 氣瓶櫃是處理半導體特殊氣體的重要裝置。

sentences.english: You must know how to stop the cylinder filling process in case of an emergency.
sentences.chinese: 你必須知道在緊急情況下，如何停止氣瓶的充裝。

sentences.english: Some view points to the standard of the hydrostatic test for the gas cylinders were presented in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文針對現行氣瓶水壓試驗國標提出了幾點看法。

sentences.english: Prior to running, turn the hand-crank of the pump to get the cylinders being lubricated beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前運行，關閉泵的手搖得到氣瓶被事先潤滑。

sentences.english: Filled cylinders should be held in quarantine until released by the qualified person.
sentences.chinese: 充好的氣瓶應保持在待檢區，直至有資格的人員放行。

sentences.english: Watch to time air supply in aqualung.
sentences.chinese: 用手錶來計算氧氣瓶中氣體的供應量。
